entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: 4.9°C
Wind: SSE 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 11 January 2023
